statements: SELECT * FROM EsportsTournaments;
SELECT tournament_name, game_title, start_date FROM EsportsTournaments WHERE location='Los Angeles';
SELECT tournament_id, tournament_name, game_title, start_date, organizer, prize_pool FROM EsportsTournaments ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT tournament_name, location FROM EsportsTournaments WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(tournament_id) AS total_tournaments, SUM(prize_pool) AS total_prize_pool FROM EsportsTournaments;
SELECT tournament_name, game_title, prize_pool FROM EsportsTournaments WHERE organizer = 'Riot Games';
SELECT * FROM EsportsTournaments WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY prize_pool DESC;
SELECT tournament_name, location, organizer FROM EsportsTournaments WHERE game_title = 'CS:GO' AND prize_pool > 10000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT game_title FROM EsportsTournaments WHERE location LIKE '%Los Angeles%' ORDER BY tournament_name;
SELECT tournament_name, prize_pool, location, start_date FROM EsportsTournaments WHERE organizer IN ('ESL', 'DreamHack') ORDER BY start_date DESC, prize_pool ASC;
SELECT * FROM tournament_schedule;
SELECT tournament_id, tournament_name FROM tournament_schedule WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT tournament_id, tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM tournament_schedule WHERE tournament_id = 1;
SELECT tournament_id, tournament_name FROM tournament_schedule ORDER BY tournament_name DESC;
SELECT tournament_id, tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM tournament_schedule WHERE start_date < '2022-06-30' AND end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM tournament_schedule WHERE tournament_id = 1;
SELECT tournament_id, team_id, result FROM tournament_results WHERE result = 'WIN' ORDER BY tournament_id ASC;
SELECT tournament_id, tournament_name FROM tournament_schedule WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM tournament_schedule JOIN tournament_results ON tournament_schedule.tournament_id = tournament_results.tournament_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT tournament_id) AS total_tournaments FROM tournament_results;
SELECT * FROM Esports_Tournaments;
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM Esports_Tournaments WHERE id = 1;
SELECT team_name, country FROM Teams ORDER BY country ASC, team_name DESC;
SELECT winning_team_id, losing_team_id FROM Match_Results WHERE match_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT coach_name FROM Teams WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM Esports_Tournaments ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM Esports_Tournaments WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY tournament_name;
SELECT Teams.team_name, Teams.country, Esports_Tournaments.tournament_name FROM Teams INNER JOIN Esports_Tournaments ON Teams.id = Esports_Tournaments.id;
SELECT Teams.team_name, Teams.country, Match_Results.match_date FROM Teams INNER JOIN Match_Results ON Teams.id = Match_Results.winning_team_id;

SELECT Teams.team_name AS winner, Teams.country AS winner_country, Teams_2.team_name AS loser, Teams_2.country AS loser_country, Match_Results.match_date FROM Match_Results INNER JOIN Teams ON Match_Results.winning_team_id = Teams.id INNER JOIN Teams AS Teams_2 ON Match_Results.losing_team_id = Teams_2.id ORDER BY Match_Results.match_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Tournament;
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM Tournament;
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM Team;
SELECT player_name, role FROM Player;
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM Tournament WHERE tournament_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Tournament WHERE tournament_id = 1;
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM Tournament WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, role FROM Player JOIN Team ON Player.team_id = Team.team_id WHERE Team.team_name = 'Team A';
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM Team ORDER BY coach_name DESC;
SELECT tournament_name, COUNT(*) AS total_matches FROM Tournament JOIN Match ON Tournament.tournament_id = Match.tournament_id GROUP BY Tournament.tournament_id;
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM tournament_schedule;
SELECT team_name, country, coach FROM teams;
SELECT player_name, date_of_birth, nationality FROM players;
SELECT match_date, team1_id, team2_id, winner_id, score FROM match_results;
SELECT player_id, matches_played, kills, deaths, assists, mvps FROM player_stats;
SELECT * FROM tournament_schedule WHERE tournament_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, country FROM teams WHERE coach = 'John Doe';
SELECT player_name, date_of_birth FROM players WHERE team_id = 3 ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT team_name, coach, country FROM teams WHERE country IN ('USA', 'Germany');
SELECT player_name, matches_played, kills, deaths, assists FROM players p JOIN player_stats ps ON p.player_id = ps.player_id WHERE ps.matches_played > 10 ORDER BY kills DESC;
